constantValues: A post belonging to a portal blog.

definitions.description: A post belonging to a portal blog.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'BlogPost' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the blog post is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.description: Shows whether the blog post is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

arguments.name: statusCode_display

members.name: name

constantValues: Shows the name or title of the blog post.

members.description: Shows the name or title of the blog post.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Contact' adds the 'authorId' attribute below to the 'BlogPost' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: authorId

constantValues: Shows the author of the blog post.

value.description: Shows the author of the blog post.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Blog' adds the 'blogId' attribute below to the 'BlogPost' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: blogId

constantValues: The Blog to which the Blog Post belongs.

constantValues: Specifies the comment policy to be used by this Blog Post.

members.description: Specifies the comment policy to be used by this Blog Post.

members.name: copy

constantValues: Shows the content of the blog post.

members.description: Shows the content of the blog post.

members.name: date

constantValues: Shows the published date of the blog post, to be displayed to users.

members.name: partialURL

constantValues: Shows the URL path fragment to be used to build a URL for this blog post.

members.description: Shows the URL path fragment to be used to build a URL for this blog post.

members.name: published

constantValues: Specifies whether the Blog Post is published, or a draft.
